sentences.english: They came over to the stem and watched the ship cutting a feather.
sentences.chinese: 他们来到船头，看着航船破浪前进。

sentences.english: Waves to slash one of the ship, Adventures of a funeral procession for the drift.
sentences.chinese: 海浪为劈风斩浪的航船饯行，为随波逐流的轻舟送葬。

sentences.english: The international community stepped in to build the boat. This is global solidarity.
sentences.chinese: 维权人士拉起风帆，国际社会造就航船，全球一心。

sentences.english: I steer my ship with hope, leaving fear behind.
sentences.chinese: 我满怀希望地驾驶航船，把恐惧抛在后面。

sentences.english: Life is like a boat, Eveybody must Learn to be skilled in boating.
sentences.chinese: 生命就像一只航船，每个人须学会如何掌舵。

sentences.english: Having little wind, this area greatly affects unpowered ships.
sentences.chinese: 有微风的时候，这个区域非常容易影响无动力航船。

sentences.english: Our troops are the steel in our ship of state.
sentences.chinese: 我们的军队是我们国家这艘航船上的钢筋铁骨。

sentences.english: The enemy submarine was detected and destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 协同攻击敌人护航船的潜艇群。

sentences.english: Try to navigate my craft so as not to capsize before either.
sentences.chinese: 我努力驾使着我的航船，不让他被任何一股风颠覆。

sentences.english: Many drops of water will sink the ship.
I try to navigate my craft so as not capsize before either.
sentences.chinese: 我努力驾驶着我的航船，不让他被任何一股风颠覆。

sentences.english: O ship is steadied by thy spars.
sentences.chinese: 哦，航船平稳都依靠你的樯桅。

sentences.english: The latitude of the ship is twenty degrees south.
sentences.chinese: 航船的纬度为南纬二十度。

sentences.english: Integrity, like life ship renewed OARS, controls the whereabouts of life.
sentences.chinese: 诚信就像人生航船的楫桨，控制着人生的去向。

sentences.english: The trustworthiness is like the barge-pole oar of life ship, controling the direction of life.
sentences.chinese: 诚信就像人生航船的楫桨，控制着人生的去向。

sentences.english: Plato compares the state to an elaborate and expensive ship.
sentences.chinese: 柏拉图将国家比作一艘复杂而昂贵的航船。

definition: to set sail on a voyage to a distant place/(fig.) to undertake a great mission
to travel a great distance by sea or air/voyage/long-haul flight
